information.title: Wash Ben's car
information.author: Ben
information.description: The car is dirty so use a hose and a rag to clean the dirt off.  You will totally learn valuable skills. Not a chore.

information.title: Mow Ben's lawn
information.author: Ben Schoolland
information.description: Find the lawnmower at his old house, fill it with gas and then use it to make the lawn shorter! It'll be fun I promise

information.title: Program a website
information.author: Beeyn
information.description: It should search through this json data and display the right information to the user. Ben got tired of coding it himself so this is a service learning opportunity now.
schools: School of Language Arts and Education
